title: Lost all my IP (preseason 8 update)
body: Hello ive already made this post about 1 week ago and i still need help as ive said before before the preseason started i had a about 4 month brake after coming back i joined than i didnt play for about 2 or so weeks since i was busy with work , as of that day i had around 100k Ip , but after the preseason 8 update joined , happy to play again saw that i lost all my ip since it was made into blue essence , i only got the started blue essence mission money back but no alse , please help

replies.body: It looks like you already completed the mission to get the BE from your rune refund, and you've already opened the BE orbs the mission gave you. When the switchover happened, it looks like you only had about 5000 IP, so it does look like you had all the BE you should have gotten.
